channel.title: Npcs With Random Drops?
channel.description: OK... I Just Realised I Have No Idea On How To Make NPC'S Drop Random Items. Is there a way i can set the items a certain npc drops, and randomize it? I'm trying to make certain npcs drop like.. phats for example. well, i tried the npcdrops.cfg, nothing happened. in my client.java there are several randomizers already but i dont know how to make them to work for the certain npcs. thanks in advance ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 05:37:05 PM[/size][hr]Can Anyone post a tut for me or a link? :P

item.title: Npcs With Random Drops?
item.dc:creator: @owningme1 owningme1
item.description:
@owningme1 wrote:

OK… I Just Realised I Have No Idea On How To Make NPC’S Drop Random Items. Is there a way i can set the items a certain npc drops, and randomize it? I’m trying to make certain npcs drop like… phats for example. well, i tried the npcdrops.cfg, nothing happened. in my client.java there are several randomizers already but i dont know how to make them to work for the certain npcs. thanks in advance ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 05:37:05 PM[/size][hr]Can Anyone post a tut for me or a link?
